column3: Concept ACK: preconditions should be documented

maybe keep both the "Only used if" and "must be positive" info
```diff
- * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future. Only used if there is change. Must be 0 if there is no change.
+ * @param[in] change_cost The cost of creating change and spending it in the future.
+ *                        Only used if there is change, in which case it must be posi
